text: Hadjer-Lamis is one of the 23 regions of Chad. Its capital is Massakory. The far north-west of the region borders on Lake Chad. The region of Hadjer-Lamis is divided into three departments: * Dababa (capital Bokoro) * Dagana (capital Massakory) * Haraze Al Biar (capital Massaguet ). ==References== Category:Regions of Chad
title: Hadjer-Lamis (region)
